data.expected_result: It says accept invite or something else.
data.short_description: The join text of the invite page of a group DM I says "Join <sender's name>" (which looks and sounds weird) whereas it says "Accept invite" on desktop.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a nameless group DM. - Create an invite for it. - Click on the invite link. - Observe the join text.
